CPR.global.generic.name: Nome
CPR.global.generic.title: Título
CPR.global.itemType.skill.accountingTool: Managing the economic and financial affairs of a business, which can mean maintaining the books, identifying cooked books, or cooking them yourself
CPR.global.itemType.skill.actingToolTip: Projecting emotions, moods, and pretending to be something or someone else
CPR.global.itemType.skill.animalHandling: Approaching, supporting, training, and caring for animals. Also includes maintaining their trust.
CPR.global.itemType.skill.archeryToolTip: How good you are at shooting things with bows and bow-like weapons
CPR.global.itemType.skill.athleticsToolT: Feats of strength, stamina, and poise; things you may do in competive sports and activities
CPR.global.itemType.skill.athleticsAndCo: Elflines skill, see Athletics or Contortionist skills for details
CPR.global.itemType.skill.autofireToolTi: Your capability to stay trained on a target while shooting on full-auto
CPR.global.itemType.skill.basicTechToolT: Maintaining and repairing simple electronics and other devices not covered by other skills
CPR.global.itemType.skill.basicTechAndWe: Elflines skill. See Basic Tech or Weapons Tech skills for more information
CPR.global.itemType.skill.briberyToolTip: Discerning how to bribe someone and what the bribe should be
CPR.global.itemType.skill.bureaucracyToo: Understanding an impersonal and complex system of rules to get what you need i.e. cutting through red tape, applying it, or wrapping someone else in it
CPR.global.itemType.skill.businessToolTi: Understanding of how to run a business: best practices, legality, organization, and other matters
CPR.global.itemType.skill.compositionToo: Artistic skill related to composing songs and written works
CPR.global.itemType.skill.compositionAnd: Elflines Skill. See Composition or Education for more information
CPR.global.itemType.skill.concealOrRevea: Hiding and finding hidden objects like concealed weapons
CPR.global.itemType.skill.concentrationT: Staying focused, maintaining control, and performing other mental efforts while under stress
CPR.global.itemType.skill.contortionistT: Twisting and pivoting your body to get out of bindings like cuffs or ropes
CPR.global.itemType.skill.conversationTo: The ability to effectively direct a speech topic to get the information you need from someone
CPR.global.itemType.skill.criminologyToo: Investigative skill related to finding evidence, clues, forensic analysis, and reviewing police records
CPR.global.itemType.skill.danceToolTip: Moving your body in a rhythmic way to express an idea, emotion, or simply to enjoy yourself
CPR.global.itemType.skill.deductionToolT: Lateral thinking where you consider several disparate data points and counterintuitively hone an accurate conclusion
CPR.global.itemType.skill.demolitionsToo: Applying the right amount of explosives to achieve a goal, or discerning how to prevent explosives from doing that
CPR.global.itemType.skill.driveLandVehic: Manuever a car, bus, truck, 4x4, bike, APC, tank... you get the idea
CPR.global.itemType.skill.educationToolT: General knowledge and understanding of school subjects
CPR.global.itemType.skill.electronicsAnd: Maintaining and repairing complex electronic devices e.g. computers, agents, and cyberdecks
CPR.global.itemType.skill.enduranceToolT: Getting through a harsh condition in the environment, or persevering through starvation, dehydration, asphyxia, or other physiological condition
CPR.global.itemType.skill.enduranceAndRe: Elflines skill. See Endurance or Resist Torture skills for more information
CPR.global.itemType.skill.evasionToolTip: Dodging out of the way of an attack
CPR.global.itemType.skill.firstAidToolTi: Treating common critical injuries and applying treatments to wounded individuals
CPR.global.itemType.skill.forgeryToolTip: Verifying the authenticity of a work, or, knowing how to fool others about yours
CPR.global.itemType.skill.gambleToolTip: Being good at math and logic in games of chance to improve your odds
CPR.global.itemType.skill.handgunToolTip: Your accuracy and precision with hand-held weapons like pistols
CPR.global.itemType.skill.heavyWeaponsTo: Your accuracy and precision with much bigger 2-handed weapons
CPR.global.itemType.skill.humanPerceptio: Reading others' reactions and disposition to glean lies, truths, and mental state
CPR.global.itemType.skill.interrogationT: Employing techniques to force others to give up knowledge they want to keep i.e. secrets
CPR.global.itemType.skill.landVehicleTec: Maintaining and repairing vehicles that travel over land without flight
CPR.global.itemType.skill.languageToolTi: Capability to speak a particular language
CPR.global.itemType.skill.languageStreet: Capability to use popular slang and colloquialisms that locals vibe with
CPR.global.itemType.skill.librarySearchT: Digging up information at libraries, data pools, and other resources
CPR.global.itemType.skill.lipReadingTool: Observing lip and mouth movements to interpret speech without hearing it
CPR.global.itemType.skill.localExpertToo: Knowledge of a specific locality: factions, politics, and the best synthetic food
CPR.global.itemType.skill.martialArtsToo: Training in a form of martial arts
CPR.global.itemType.skill.meleeWeaponToo: Hitting things with other things up close.
CPR.global.itemType.skill.paintOrDrawOrS: Capability to produce an impactful artistic work
CPR.global.itemType.skill.paramedicToolT: As first aid, but can treat more severe critical injuries
CPR.global.itemType.skill.perceptionTool: Awareness of things going on around you, spotting clues, or noticing something out of place
CPR.global.itemType.skill.personalGroomi: Taking your physical form to the next level and maximizing the benefits when you do.
CPR.global.itemType.skill.persuasionTool: Appearing genuine enough to convince or influence others with words
CPR.global.itemType.skill.persuasionAndT: Elflines skill. See Persuasion or Trading skills for more information
CPR.global.itemType.skill.photographyAnd: Capability to get the perfect shot with a camera, video recorder, or braindance record
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pickLockToolTi: Ability to unlock non-electronic locks when you do not have the key
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pickLockAndPic: Elflines skill. See Pick Lock or Pick Pocket skills for more information.
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pickPocketTool: Lifting small items from others or from stores without detection
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pilotAirVehicl: Fly a plane, heli, jet, or other piloted vehicle
CPR.global.itemType.skill.pilotSeaVehicl: Manuever a boat, skiff, tanker, or other floating vessel
CPR.global.itemType.skill.playInstrument: Kinda self explanatory right choom? Playing a musical instrument
CPR.global.itemType.skill.resistTortureO: Maintaining control through pain and discomfort, whether that be torture, drugs, or interrogations
CPR.global.itemType.skill.ridingToolTip: Working with a living animal trained to provide transportation
CPR.global.itemType.skill.scienceToolTip: Knowing how to design experiments to accurately test hypotheses, write papers about them, and converse with academics
CPR.global.itemType.skill.shoulderArmsTo: Your accuracy and precision with weapons that are normally braced against a shoulder
CPR.global.itemType.skill.stealthToolTip: Do something or getting somewhere without being noticed, typically while trespassing
CPR.global.itemType.skill.streetwiseTool: Wisdom on the street. Knowing how to get goods you shouldn't, and get out of dodge
CPR.global.itemType.skill.tacticsToolTip: Effectively directing your resources in battle, and predicting how the enemy will react
CPR.global.itemType.skill.trackingToolTi: Following where something went based on clues or other evidence
CPR.global.itemType.skill.tradingToolTip: Ability to discern an item's value, and land a good deal when making a trade
CPR.global.itemType.skill.wardrobeAndSty: Knowing the right ensemble to pull off the perfect look, and nailing it.
CPR.global.itemType.skill.wildernessSurv: Knowing how to last in the great outdoors: foraging, sheltering, and surviving

CPR.global.stats.coolToolTip: Capacity to influence and impress using your natural charms and charisma
CPR.global.stats.dexToolTip: Capacity to balance, coordinate motor skills, and your proprioception
CPR.global.stats.empToolTip: Capacity to relate to others' plight and keep your own humanity
CPR.global.stats.intToolTip: Capacity to learn, apply reasoning, perceive, and extrapolate
CPR.global.stats.moveToolTip: Movement capability, your speed at running, jumping, swimming, etc
CPR.global.stats.refToolTip: Capacity to coordinate motor skills and your reaction time
CPR.global.stats.techToolTip: Capacity to use tools and instruments of technology
CPR.global.stats.willToolTip: Capacity to endure stress and privation

CPR.netArchitecture.generation.done: A geração de cena foi concluída, talvez seja necessário sair para outra cena e carregar esta cena novamente se ela não for exibida corretamente.
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.floorForm: O nome do andar não se encaixa no formato desejado. Use um número seguido diretamente por uma letra pequena se desejado, por exemplo, 4, 4a ou 6c.
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.noFloorEr: Os Itens parecem não ter quaisquer andares especificados!
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.noGMError: Erro: Você não tem permissão de GM. Nenhuma geração de cena permitida!
CPR.netArchitecture.generation.useRollta: Use Rolltables to populate the NET architecture
CPR.rolls.deathSave.title: Salva de Morte
CPR.rolls.modifiers.additionalModWarning: The additional mod field only accepts numbers separated by commas or spaces.
CPR.settings.theme.title: Theme
CPR.settings.theme.hint: Select CSS Theme to use for the system
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.desc: Using your own compendia for system automations requires that they use specific naming and structure. Click the question marks to see the documentation.
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.hint: Choose compendia the system will use for various automations like critical injuries and generating net architectures.
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.name: Configure System Compendia
CPR.settings.compendiumMenu.title: Configure System Compendia
CPR.settings.criticalInitiative.hint: When enabled, a critical initiative roll (good or bad) will roll and apply another die to the initiative roll
CPR.settings.criticalInitiative.name: Initiative rolls criticals
CPR.settings.criticalInjuryRollTableComp: Click for more information on creating homebrew critical injuries
Set the compendium of RollTables to inspect when rolling for a critical injury on character sheet.
CPR.settings.debugElements.hint: Mostrar elementos de depuração na interface do usuário, como IDs de itens internos
CPR.settings.debugElements.name: Depurar Elementos na UI
CPR.settings.debugLogs.hint: Ativar registros de depuração, preenchendo-os com informações úteis para desenvolvedores de sistema e testadores.
CPR.settings.debugLogs.name: Log de Depuração
CPR.settings.deleteConfirmation.hint: Quando ativado, apagar um item pedirá confirmação
CPR.settings.deleteConfirmation.name: Confirmação de exclusão de item
CPR.settings.deleteContainer.hint: When deleting a item, should installed items also be deleted? If unchecked, they'll be uninstalled instead.
CPR.settings.deleteContainer.name: Delete Installed Items
CPR.settings.displayStatusAsActiveEffect: When enabled, token status will be displayed in the Active Effects tab of the character sheet
Display Token Status as an Effect
CPR.settings.dvRollTableCompendium.help: Click for more information on custom DV Tables
CPR.settings.dvRollTableCompendium.name: DV Tables
CPR.settings.enablePauseAnimation.hint: Requer recarregamento completo para ter efeito (Ctrl+F5)
CPR.settings.enablePauseAnimation.name: Ativar Animação de Pausar
CPR.settings.invertRollCtrlFunction.hint: Quando ativado, as caixas de diálogo de rolagem são ignoradas por padrão e habilitadas quando se segura a CTRL
CPR.settings.invertRollCtrlFunction.name: Inverter a função de CTRL em rolagens
CPR.settings.migrateLockedCompendia.name: Migrate Locked Compendia
CPR.settings.migrateLockedCompendia.hint: Enabling this will migrate locked compendiums then re-lock them once migrations complete
CPR.settings.migrateModuleCompendia.name: Migrate Module Compendia
CPR.settings.migrateModuleCompendia.hint: Enabling this will migrate external (non world) Compendiums. Only enable this if you have external Modules providing Compendiums for the system.
CPR.settings.mookSheetSkillDisplay.hint: Na ficha do NPC escolha como as habilidades são exibidas. Você precisará reabrir o Ator para que qualquer alteração tenha efeito. Nível = pontos na habilidade, Base = Nível + Status (exemplos no livro da regra), e Total = Nível + Atributo + Mods persistentes.
CPR.settings.mookSheetSkillDisplay.name: Opções de habilidades para NPCs
Click for more information on creating net architectures with custom tables
Set the compendium used when generating a net architecture randomly
CPR.settings.playersCreateInventory.hint: Quando ativado, jogadores podem criar itens diretamente em seu inventário
CPR.settings.playersCreateInventory.name: Jogadores podem criar itens
CPR.settings.preventDuplicateCriticalInj: Off = Allow duplicate Critical Injuries. Warn = Warn if duplicate Critical Injury is applied. Reroll = Reroll duplicate Critical Injuries.
CPR.settings.systemDataModelVersion.hint: Fixar o modelo de dados do sistema em uma versão específica. Isso forçará ou evitará migrações de dados e será MUITO PERIGO. Apenas use isso se você for testador ou desenvolvedor no módulo do sistema.
CPR.settings.systemDataModelVersion.name: Versão do Modelo de Dados do Sistema
CPR.settings.title: Configurações
CPR.settings.traceLogs.hint: Ativa os registros de Debug. Ative isso quando você estiver rastreando um bug ou desenvolvendo módulos.
CPR.settings.traceLogs.name: Registros de Debug
CPR.settings.warnAboutNoTargetsWhenRolli: Uncheck to disable the warning about having no tokens targeted when rolling damage. Useful if you don't want to enforce using Foundry's targeting functionality.
CPR.system.message.toBeDeprecated: Usage of '{functionName}' will be deprecated in a future release.  See changelog for more details.
CPR.tooltip.isTooLargeForThisField: is too large for this field
CPR.tooltip.nameChangeWarning: Changing the name of CPR-Core Items (Roles & Role Abilities) may affect other translations within the game
